modShortDescription: This adds the options '91, 101, 125, 151, 175, 201' as Land Claim Size options in addition to the default '21, 31, 41, 51, 71' options.
modDescription:
This adds the options ’91, 101, 125, 151, 175, 201′ as Land Claim Size options in addition to the default ’21, 31, 41, 51, 71′ options.

These options are also added as available filter choices in the server browser.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_UIMENU_MoreLandClaimSizeOptions)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
